q01.question:
Use your reddit.py with the URL https://yld.me/raw/ffjX to answer the following questions:

  1. The first post has how many votes? ____
  2. The third post has the following shortened URL: https://is.gd/____
  3. The third post has the following title when limited to 10 characters: ____
  4. The last post when sorting by title has how many votes? ____

q02.question:
Use your demographics.py to answer the following questions:

  1. How many male students are in the class of 2024? ____
  2. What percentage of the 2024 class is female? ____ %
  3. Which class year had the lowest percentage of Caucasians? ____
  4. Which class year had the highest percentage of Asians? ____
  5. How many Hispanic students were in the class of 2020? ____
  6. How many Black or African American students were in the class of 2022? ____
